Topic.Title: Newbie: How do you add two categories?

Posts.EditableText: So on my first text based adventure, I got a comment suggesting I should add another tag, but I don't know how to add two categories into one game. How do you add another category into a game?
Posts.HTML: So on my first text based adventure, I got a comment suggesting I should add another tag, but I don't know how to add two categories into one game. How do you add another category into a game?

Posts.EditableText: Its not possible to do that, you must choose one category
Posts.HTML: Its not possible to do that, you must choose one category
